actions.text: Referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A concurrent resolution stating that no action be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that no action should be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's economic program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution stating that no action be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.
